values: 强迫，迫使；使感激；施恩惠与，帮...的忙
To oblige someone means to require them to do something.
If I wanted to have playtime, I was obliged to clean my room once a week.
vt. 迫使；强制；赐，施恩惠；责成；义务 vi. 帮忙；施恩惠
